source.7670c578:
# I tried to find how we can find early diabetes symptom to prevent serious condition.
# By RandomForestClassifier, I can classify it with 98% accuracy.

# In SHAP, I can find the each impact to diabetes.
![image.png](attachment:a650f53f-ff53-4160-88dd-73dc040a36b2.png)

* Polyuria is a condition where the body urinates more than usual and passes excessive or abnormally large amounts of urine each time you urinate. No-polyuria and diabetes are strong negative correlation. It means that if we have no polyuria symptom, it may not be diabetes.

* Polydipsia is the term given to excessive thirst and is one of the initial symptoms of diabetes. If we feel thirsty all the time or your thirst is stronger than usual and continues even after you drink, it can be a sign that not all is well inside your body.
